text: Dr. Blasey Ford, we are with you. #BelieveSurvivors

RT @DavidCamposSF Earlier this evening @SFDemocrats calling swing congressional districts at the #RedToBlueSF HQ. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DoE2R4eUYAAnXcY.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DoE2R4fUcAA_PTV.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DoE2R4fUwAA90Jg.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DoE2R4fVsAA7jpt.jpg

2018 must be the year the Senate stands up and says a man's job promotion is not worth more than a survivor's pain. For too long, we have allowed a culture that diminishes assault, isolates survivors and blames them. This must change. #BelieveSurvivors http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1045484672900362240/pu/img/2CiREfxfadK3RudX.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1045484672900362240/pu/vid/320x180/Dx4_9osyE91E0aZk.mp4?tag=5

Senator Dick Durbin: "With what degree of certainty do you believe Brett Kavanaugh assaulted you?"

Dr. Christine Blasey Ford: "100 percent." http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1045372725999685633/img/tHuawHOPa8VJFgnZ.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1045372725999685633/vid/240x240/cGpggbVXoh4hm1Jt.mp4?tag=8

All the norms that once governed our politics & public discourse are gone. Today,my colleagues on the Judiciary Committee,on both sides,have an opportunity to set a better example for our country by treating Dr. Ford & Judge Kavanaugh with respect & listening without prejudgement
Dr. Ford's testimony today is heartbreaking, credible, and compelling. Anyone watching can have no doubt she is telling the truth. I believe her, and I hope my Republican colleagues do too.

Dr. Ford,

Thank you for speaking truth to power. What you did today for survivors across this country, was nothing short of heroic. In awe of your courage and bravery. #BelieveSurvivors http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1045390390449201152/pu/img/tBPA8dI_qOIn88yU.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1045390390449201152/pu/vid/320x180/axjopOiV9h80Rsge.mp4?tag=5

I want to thank the millions of people who tuned in to listen to Dr. Ford’s testimony, and every single person who showed up today to support her. Listening to survivors matters. Making your voice heard matters – Dr. Ford proved that today. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DoH4KZUWkAAX3wy.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DoH4KZ9U8AADi3o.jpg

Today I expressed my concerns over Senate Democrats’ inaction & delay in handling the allegations presented before @senjudiciary, and especially how this delay harmed Dr. Ford & Judge Kavanaugh, their families, their reputations & their personal lives. —> https://www.cruz.senate.gov/?p=press_release&id=4110 http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1045502875366031361/pu/img/s0KWV5atvEn2NJ-1.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1045502875366031361/pu/vid/320x180/4ZSnxlq3HZCijigf.mp4?tag=5

.@SenatorDurbin asked Judge Kavanaugh if he would support an FBI investigation to clear his name. He refused to answer. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1045437780669681664/img/peWs6MiLFQ1fykte.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1045437780669681664/vid/240x240/OaNSV6rIemDLBxD9.mp4?tag=8

"Not everything that is faced can be changed, but nothing can be changed until it is faced."

My heart is with the far too many survivors across America for whom this hearing might cause additional pain. 

I have hope that truth and justice will prevail. 

#BelieveSurvivors

One way for Brett Kavanaugh to clear his name is to submit to an FBI investigation. But he refuses. And he won't release the thousands of documents from his gov't service. What is he hiding? A Justice should have honesty & integrity. Kavanaugh has neither – he should withdraw.

Show your neighbors where you stand this November. 

Order a yard sign today and have it delivered to you door --> https://secure.tedcruz.org/yard-sign #TXSen #CruzCrew #KeepTexasRed

I asked Kavanaugh whether, like Dr. Ford, he had taken a polygraph, whether he would call for an FBI investigation into the allegations, and whether he watched Dr. Ford's testimony. None of his answers were "yes." http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1045464485073440768/img/Bhnky9ZfNSuvQxtZ.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1045464485073440768/vid/320x180/LINHcivwYWI8i8O4.mp4?tag=8

Three women who have accused Kavanaugh have asked for an FBI investigation. Kavanaugh refused to say whether or not he'd ask the White House to conduct an FBI investigation about the recent allegations.

RT @FoxNews .@SenTedCruz to Brett Kavanaugh: "You [and Dr. Ford] have both seen your good names dragged through the mud. And this has sadly been one of the most shameful chapters in the history of the United States Senate." http://www.foxnews.com/politics/2018/09/27/emotional-kavanaugh-decries-circus-and-maintains-innocence-as-ford-testifies-sexually-assaulted-me.html http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DoIoPz3XoAEPrq0.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1045441944887922689/vid/320x180/cHvndN3Tuu7NWz9G.mp4?tag=8

RT @CoryBooker Dr. Ford,

Thank you for speaking truth to power. What you did today for survivors across this country, was nothing short of heroic. In awe of your courage and bravery. #BelieveSurvivors http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1045390390449201152/pu/img/tBPA8dI_qOIn88yU.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1045390390449201152/pu/vid/320x180/axjopOiV9h80Rsge.mp4?tag=5

Today we need to remember: Dr. Christine Blasey Ford and the others who have come forward have done so with incredible courage, fully knowing that their character would be attacked and terrible things said about them. Their lives will never be the same. We owe them our respect.

I listened to Dr. Ford and Judge Kavanaugh. I believe Dr. Ford. 

Brett Kavanaugh does not belong on the Supreme Court.

If Judge Kavanaugh wants to clear his name of these serious charges he should demand an FBI investigation. If not, the Senate must reject his nomination.

We should not be attacking and disparaging the women who have come forward with serious allegations against Judge Kavanaugh. Trump's comments are disgusting. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DoHI1GKXoAESawJ.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1045336748006547456/vid/240x240/Dd9HEV40ZH4RCUqm.mp4?tag=8

My final question for Judge Kavanaugh: Did you watch Dr. Ford's testimony? 

His answer: "I did not."

RT @SenateDems Watch live as Dr. Christine Blasey Ford and Judge Kavanaugh testify before the Senate Judiciary Committee. She needs to be heard and treated with the respect all survivors deserve. https://twitter.com/i/broadcasts/1PlKQrPQXXkGE
My opponent supported a $10 tax on every barrel of Texas-produced oil... #TXSen #ChooseCruz #KeepTexasRed

RT @TeamPelosi Dr. Christine Blasey Ford made the courageous decision to come forward with her story of sexual assault by now-Supreme Court nominee Judge Brett Kavanaugh. We stand with her. We #BelieveSurvivors. #MeToo http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DnzWL0xXUAAhyt-.jpg

Dr. Ford has passed a polygraph test and given the Committee the results. Judge Kavanaugh has not. She has called for outside witnesses to testify. Judge Kavanaugh has not. She called for an FBI investigation. Judge Kavanaugh has not.
I know that today's hearing was difficult for a lot of people across the country. Please know there is support available if you need it. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DoJEHt2UwAAb78L.jpg
Dr. Ford is not on trial. She is sitting here because she has the courage to come forward and because it was her “civic duty.” I believe her.

Joined @SenTedCruz in introducing the School Security Enhancement Act, which would give schools the option to improve security by using federal funds for measures like hiring security officers, implementing technology & reinforcing safety equipment. https://www.rubio.senate.gov/public/index.cfm?p=Press-Releases&id=DFECAC27-E6B1-4D06-B454-81D42372319E

My heart is with the far too many survivors across America for whom this hearing might cause additional pain. 

I have hope that truth and justice will prevail. 

#BelieveSurvivors

Right now, many survivors of sexual assault are reliving trauma. If you’re a survivor, know that you are not alone. If you need to talk, you can call 800-656-HOPE to reach a national, confidential helpline 24/7. There is also an online hotline here -> https://hotline.rainn.org/online/.
False scales are an abomination to the LORD, but an honest weight, his delight. Proverbs 11:1
